name: Purple Chicken Game Boy
description:
I felt like seeing if I could port our Xbox One/PC game Purple Chicken Spaceman to the Game Boy, and this is the result!  This is a prototype, and if there's enough interest, we'd like to make it into a full title with new features not found in the original.  Heck, maybe this ends up being a sequel!

Original PCS Theme Song by Parry Grip, Gameboy Conversion by Eli Hedman.
